name: Fright Fight: Online Multiplayer Fighting for Mobile
blurb: Fright Fight is a \u2018Smash Bros\u2019 style online multiplayer brawler featuring horror, steampunk, RPG elements... and zombies!

rewards.reward: FRIGHT FIGHT FAN! \r\n=============================\r\nOur sincere \u2018thank you\u2019, your name howled at the moon, and an exclusive Fright Fight desktop wallpaper.

TRISKAIDEKAPHOB-OUYA ============================= Unlock a copy of Fright Fight for OUYA, where Fright Fight will be fully-paid (not free-to-play). And the Fright Fight Folio -- a digital art book full of cool concept sketches and game artwork. Plus our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper. Don't be afraid to select higher rewards if desired...we'll ask you what system you have later.

TRISKAIDEKAPHOBIA\r\n=============================\r\nWe hope you're not afraid of the number thirteen, because you'll get 13,000 coins to start your gameplay right! And the Fright Fight Folio -- a digital art book full of cool concept sketches and game artwork. Plus our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

YOU'RE 4 FRIGHT FIGHT\r\n=============================\r\nStart the game with all four (4) characters unlocked! Plus 13,000 coins, the frightfully artistic Fright Fight Folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

DOUBLE TROUBLE\r\n=============================\r\nGain double experience for three (3) months! Plus all 4 characters unlocked, 2x13k=26k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

SKIN IN THE GAME\r\n=============================\r\nGet four (4) exclusive skins (one for each character), available to Kickstarter backers only! Plus double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 3x13k=39k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

ADRENALINE RUSH\r\n=============================\r\nFeel the rush! An exclusive character boost available for backers only. Plus the four exclusive skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 4x13k=52k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

TO DIE FOR\r\n=============================\r\nDying to play Fright Fight before anyone else? You'll get access to our EXCLUSIVE BETA this December and provide input directly to the development team. Plus the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 5x13k=65k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

DO THE MONSTER MASH\r\n=============================\r\nDo you remember the song "Monster Mash" by Bobby "Boris" Pickett and the Crypt-Kickers? It was a graveyard smash! In that spirit, get a DRM-free digital copy of the Fright Fight sound track. Plus beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 6x13k=78k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

FAME AND FORTUNE\r\n=============================\r\nYour name in the game credits and an exclusive backer Fright Fight T-Shirt! Plus the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 7x13k=91k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

GRAVEYARD SHIFT\r\n=============================\r\nYour name carved onto a tombstone to appear in a special graveyard area in-game. RIP! Plus your name in the credits, the T-Shirt, the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 9x13k=117k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

FRIGHT FIGHT 3D\r\n=============================\r\nGet your choice of character printed on the revolutionary Form1 3D printer, in clear resin. Plus your name on a tombstone, your name in the credits, the T-Shirt, the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 10x13k=130k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

CREATURE FEATURES\r\n=============================\r\nGet a set of ALL FOUR (4) characters printed on the revolutionary Form1 3D printer, in clear resin. Plus your name on a tombstone, your name in the credits, the T-Shirt, the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 130k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

SKILLS AND THRILLS\r\n=============================\r\nWork with our game designer to design a new skill for one of the characters. Plus all four (4) characters in 3D, your name on a tombstone, your name in the credits, the T-Shirt, the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 130k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper.

SAY MY NAME\r\n=============================\r\nWork with us to name an arena! Make everyone say your arena name (subject to approval, of course). Plus all four (4) characters in 3D, your name on a tombstone, your OUTLINED name in the credits, the T-Shirt, the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 130k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper. Note: Skills and Thrills not included.

ETERNAL LIFE\r\n=============================\r\nWork with our artists to design a one-of-a-kind custom skin for a character of your choice! Exclusively yours to use in-game. Plus all four (4) characters in 3D, your name on a tombstone, your OUTLINED name in the credits, the T-Shirt, the Monster Mash, beta access, the exclusive backer boost, four exclusive backer skins, double experience for 3 months, all 4 characters, 130k coins, art folio, our thanks, your name howled at the moon, and the exclusive wallpaper. Note: Skills and Thrills not included.
